pullRequest.title: Refactor native image config to avoid warnings
pullRequest.bodyText:
This eliminates the warnings produced by the native image Maven plugin which look like:
[WARNING] jar:file:///Users/graemerocher/.m2/repository/io/micronaut/micronaut-runtime/2.2.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT/micronaut-runtime-2.2.0.BUILD-SNAPSHOT.jar!/META-INF/native-image/io.micronaut/runtime-graal/native-image.properties does not match recommended META-INF/native-image/${groupId}/${artifactId}/native-image.properties layout

commit.message: Refactor native image config to avoid warnings
